message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.RO, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with computer vision and graphics, specifically the task of 3D human body pose, hand pose, and facial expression estimation from a single monocular image. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves graphics and animation, which suggests cs.GR (Computer Graphics) as the second likely sub-category. The use of neural networks and optimization techniques for pose estimation suggests cs.MM (Multimedia) as the third likely sub-category. The paper also involves robotics and human-computer interaction, which suggests cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) as the fourth and fifth likely sub-categories, respectively.
